weapon.name: Steel Sword
weapon.description: A finely crafted steel sword, known for its balance and durability.

weapon.name: Battle Axe
weapon.description: A fearsome battle axe, forged by the legendary smiths of old, said to cleave through armor like butter.

weapon.name: Longbow
weapon.description: A masterfully crafted longbow, capable of striking targets with pinpoint accuracy from great distances.

weapon.name: Poisoned Dagger
weapon.description: An enchanted dagger coated with a deadly poison, perfect for swift and silent eliminations.

weapon.name: Spiked Mace
weapon.description: A brutal spiked mace, designed to crush bones and armor alike in close combat.

weapon.name: Elemental Staff
weapon.description: An epic staff infused with elemental energies, capable of unleashing devastating spells.

weapon.name: Dragon Spear
weapon.description: A mythical spear said to be forged from the scales of dragons, imbued with the power of fire and fury.

weapon.name: Thunder Hammer
weapon.description: A divine hammer crackling with the power of thunder, capable of sundering the earth itself.

weapon.name: Excalibur
weapon.description: The legendary Excalibur, a greatsword of kings, said to choose its wielder and bring forth victory in battle.

weapon.name: Soul Reaper
weapon.description: A dark scythe whispered to harvest souls, its blade sharp enough to cut through the fabric of reality itself.
